황혼의 사제:
[ 봉인 선택 ]
You must decide which seal you wish to fight for.
To control a seal, more than 35% of the members of the party must fight for that seal. If a party controlled a seal in the previous competition and if 10% or more of their members continue to fight for that seal, they'll control it again.
Which seal do you want to fight for?
